DOC.brief_summary: Online survey for 11-17 year olds about behavior, sleep, and food consumption patterns. This survey can be completed on any computer that has internet access.
DOC.detailed_description: The following opportunity is a reserach project at the American University Behavioral Pharmacology and Health Promotions Laboratory (BPHP). The study population is 11-17 year olds. The 30 minute online survey asks questions about behavior, sleep, and typical food consumption. The purpose of this survey is to better understand these habits in young people and the effects of these habits on behavior and sleep. This information will provide us with a better understanding of the daily habits in young people and guide the direction of future research projects.
